page.title: 14LIFE-STYLE - CHILDREN 1.
page.content: {ABOUT MYSELF,1985.} My name is MICHELLE LOUISE MOORHOUSE. I live at 1 Saville Street,Emley. I'm a girl, 10 years old. I weighed 8lb 4 oz at birth and now weigh 23 kg. I'm one of the smallest children in my class. I suffer from asthma. I am l.27m tall. My hair and eyes are brown. I have 4 brothers David, 9, Neil 7, Stephen 4 & Graham 9months. I live in a semi-detached house owned by Kirkless M.D.C. I go to{EMLEY FIRST {SCHOOL.}On school days I wake at 8 o'clock, go downstairs and sit huddled by the fire, drinking{COFFEE.I get dressed, wash and have breakfast, usually cereal. Then I put my pumps, shorts and things in my school bag.On Monday I take my bag.On Tuesday I take my school library books back. I'm also a member of the library van which comes each Tuesday at 5.30 p.m.{Cont'd
